listing.name: B&B room gardenside, riverfront

user.about:
We are Jaap (53) and Marijke (45) with our children Hannah (13) and Ytse (11). We rent 2 different apartments:

On the Amstel River, we rent a downstairs apartment (completely renovated in 2014) with a double bed, a sleeping couch plus extra matress plus all the furniture, kitchen and a very large, private bathroom. This floor - 80m2 - is suited for longer stays. Fully furnished with washer/dryer, internet, TV, spacious study room etc.  Our house - from 1900 - is right on the Amstel river with a garden at the back. You can easily walk downtown (10 minutes) along the tree-lined riverfront with houseboats. You can park in front or we have detailed 'cheaper parking' instructions. We are at 200m from Metrostation Wibautstraat and 600m. from Amstel Station (train, subway, tram, bus). 

Also we rent a one-bedroom apartment in the East-side of the Centre, near the Nautical Museum. Complete kitchen, washing machine etc., very quite area.

We hope to hear from you!
user.first_name: Amstelview Apartment Riverside Plus Charming Apartment Nautical Museum

listing.access: Garden, Veranda with terrace, Riverfront, bikes
listing.description:
Most guests say: "We never thought such quiet, relaxed houses could exist right in the middle of Amsterdam!" Yes, we were lucky with this nice house built in 1900 with a quiet, shady garden plus veranda at the back, where we made a private B&B room 'downstairs' (half below street level, what we call souterrain). It is with a double bed (plus an extra sleeping sofa) and a separate private bathroom. The B&B can accommodate two people to four people. This garden side b&b with river frontis a family friendly and offers the following amenities; cable TV and wireless internet. Breakfast is served in our dining room. At the front is the tree -lined Amstel river plus house boats, rowing boats, ducks, flowers.... 

Yet the Metro is at 150m (4 stops from Central Station), and Amstel Station is at walking distance, or 1 subway - stop. Cars can be parked (paid, no charge on Sundays!) in front.
listing.house_rules: We are flexible, but non-smokers. We get up early. You get the front-door key and we'll tell you where to dine and where to go. We speak English, Francais, Deutsch, Italiano, Espanol, PortuguÃªs.
listing.interaction: Check-in, after that maximum flexibility. We can make breakfast if wanted.
listing.neighborhood_overview: Just outside downtown, this means: quiet, good sleeping (no noise, no cars), green, spacious. To the historical center is a 10 minute walk along the amstel river!
listing.notes: Please note: we prefer a single guest that stays for longer periods. So,  requests for short visits and requests of groups, we will somtimes reject. (In april and may, the high-season for city-visits, we do accept short visits, if the apartment then is available.)

Yet the Metro is at 150m (4 stops from Central Station), and Amstel Station is at walking distance, or 1 subway - stop. Cars can be parked (paid, no charge on Sundays!) in front.
listing.summary: Large 80m2 fully furnished apartment on Amstel River. Private bathroom, full kitchen, large bedroom, extra sleeping couch. Wifi, TV, coffeemaker, oven, washer, dryer, parking. Entrance + hallway shared with family that lives ground + first floor.
listing.transit: 200m. from Metro Wibautstraat and 600m. from Amstel Station (trains and metro and buses).
listing.additional_house_rules: We are flexible, but non-smokers. We get up early. You get the front-door key and we'll tell you where to dine and where to go. We speak English, Francais, Deutsch, Italiano, Espanol, PortuguÃªs.

review.comments: We really enjoyed our stay in Amsterdam. The flat was spacious and clean, comfortable for the 5 of us. The location was excellent - right next to the main canal Amstel and near the centre and all the tourist attractions. The surroundings beautiful. The hosts were very helpful and sympathetic (they even let us feed their cats :)  as we are all cat-lovers). We strongly recommend it.
